review: Fire Stick worked great as a mobile streaming device when I used it during a recent vacation hotel stay. I know before when I tried the stick at a hotel it didn't work due to the need for a hotel wifi log in step. However now when you turn it on and access a wifi signal, up comes the hotel's wifi log on screen. Worked great, highly portable and gives you much more flexible and economical choice for the kids to watch something without forking over huge pay per view fees. Hotel TV does of course need to have an HDMI input but that is fairly standard in most of the major chain hotels.
